title: looking for school script font?
content:
As always, much appreciated.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/school_3715.jpg)

 [‹ Condensed typeface?](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45220 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font Identification ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45211 "Go to next forum topic")
author: stealyourboognish

comments.content: Best I can do are these alternatives: [Amadeo](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/amadeo_std_bold/?sample_text=School&sample_size=96), [Matinee Idol](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/comicraft/matineeidol_regular/?sample_text=School%20&sample_size=74), [Handsome](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/shinntype/handsome_pro_regular_ot/), [Memimas Alt](http://web.archive.org/web/20081012142422/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/type_o_tones/memimas_alt_bold/?sample_text=School%20&sample_size=96)
